name: EzDubs
headline: Real-time speech translation
description:
EzDubs is a real-time speech translator. Our proprietary models translate speech without waiting for complete sentences, clone voices on the fly (without enrollments), and even replicate emotions in the translated language. 

Our iOS and Android apps translate live phone calls, automatically dub voice messages, and auto-translate text conversations so that you can communicate seamlessly across languages, with your voice and emotions. Thousands of users use EzDubs to communicate with friends and family who speak different languages, manage offshore teams, and even have relationships across languages. 

Visit https://ezdubs.ai to download our app and try a live demo of our real-time speech translator, or reach out to explore how EzDubs can integrate with your communication stack to enable live multilingual conversations.

founders.name: Padmanabhan (Paddy) Krishnamurthy, Founder
founders.description: Building EzDubs. Ex-Columbia, Webex, USC, HKUST ML research

#  AI Phone Translator for Calls, Messages and More 
With your voice and emotions 
[ Download for Free ![App Store](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/logos/apple.png) ![Play Store](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/logos/playstore.png) ](http://www.ezdubs.ai/<#>) [ TRY NOW ](http://www.ezdubs.ai/<#>)
[ ![Google Play](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/playstore-badge.png) ](http://www.ezdubs.ai/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ai.ezdubs.eztrek&referrer=utm_source%3Ddirect%26utm_medium%3Dweb%26utm_campaign%3Dmain_page>) [ ![App Store](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/appstore-badge.png) ](http://www.ezdubs.ai/<https:/apps.apple.com/app/ezdubs-talk/id6470951323>)
##  How it Works 
Watch EzDubs translate a call to a Japanese Hotel in real-time, preserving voice and emotions across languages. 
PausePlay

##  Real-Time Translation for All Your Online Communication 
EzDubs makes global conversations through calls, voice messages, and texts as natural as talking to a neighbor. 
[ ![Play Store](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/playstore.png) ](http://www.ezdubs.ai/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ai.ezdubs.eztrek&referrer=utm_source%3Ddirect%26utm_medium%3Dweb%26utm_campaign%3Dmain_page>) [ ![App Store](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/appstore.png) ](http://www.ezdubs.ai/<https:/apps.apple.com/app/ezdubs-talk/id6470951323>)
![Phone Call Transcript](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/images/features/bg-light-grey/phone-calls.jpg)
###  Phone Calls 
Call a hotel in a foreign country, or your international friends in their native language. 
Experience near-zero latency translations that keep conversations natural and uninterrupted. Communicate without waiting. 
The best part? The other person doesn't need to have EzDubs installed - they don't even need a smartphone. 
![Voice Memo](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/images/features/bg-light-grey/voice-messages.jpg)
###  Voice Messages 
Our advanced voice cloning technology ensures that your translated speech maintains your unique voice, tone, and emotions. Speak in any language, but still sound like yourself. 
They even get transcribed. 
![EzDubs Messenger Conversation](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/images/features/bg-light-grey/text-messages.jpg)
###  Text Messages 
No more copy-pasting between translators and messaging apps. Go back-and-forth in different languages, uninterrupted. 
![Video Dubbing](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/images/features/bg-light-grey/video-messages.jpg)
###  Video Messages 
Record a happy birthday message to that Swedish friend you met on exchange - and dub it into their language. Or instantly translate breaking news from another corner of the world. 
![Meetings & Team Messaging](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/images/features/bg-light-grey/meetings.jpg)
Coming Soon 
###  Meetings and Messaging 
Global recruitment, client meetings, and collaboration simplified. 
From Zoom and Microsoft Teams to Google Meet, Webex, Slack, and Discord—our plugin works everywhere you need it. 
Email address Notify me 
or reach us at founders@ezdubs.ai
## Here's What Our Users Have to Say
![User 1](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/images/people-faces/green-2.png)
> It's crazy how the translation starts playing before I even finish speaking - what magic is this!
![User 2](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/images/people-faces/grey-3.png)
> This is the first time I've seen an app like this - I can hear your live translation, and it sounds just like your voice!
![User 3](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/images/people-faces/orange-2.png)
> Wait, if I speak in English will you hear me in Portuguese? ...HOLY SHIT IT WORKS.
![User 4](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/images/people-faces/blue-2.png)
> I didn't think that your translated voice would also whisper when you whispered - I'm shocked!
![User 5](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/images/people-faces/blue-4.png)
> My girlfriend and I don't speak each other's languages, but we're able to speak to each other for hours every day thanks to EzDubs and actually build a deeper connection.
![User 6](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/images/people-faces/orange-1.png)
> It translates in real-time, so it doesn't feel like I'm waiting for her to finish before I understand what she says - the conversation feels fast and smooth.
![User 7](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/images/people-faces/green-1.png)
> Now we can communicate on a daily basis without needing to ask my sister (who speaks both our languages) to join our call and translate for us.
![User 8](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/images/people-faces/grey-1.png)
> My contractor and I have been searching for a phone call translator app every week, but nothing ever "just worked" like EzDubs. It's a game changer for how we're collaborating on our projects.
![User 9](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/images/people-faces/grey-2.png)
> My employees speak 6 different languages. Now I have all of them in one group chat and everyone can understand each other's messages, and can use their voice to express themselves better.
![User 10](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/images/people-faces/orange-4.png)
> It barely worked on my cellular network, and kept dropping phone calls. So I changed my cellular provider to be able to use EzDubs.
![User 11](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/images/people-faces/blue-3.png)
> I no longer need to keep jumping between my chat app and my translator app. My voice gets translated too, so I actually switched to sending longer messages because that's so much easier on EzDubs.
![User 12](http://www.ezdubs.ai/static/assets/images/people-faces/green-3.png)
> It's so good to hear my girlfriend's voice in my language in an EzDubs chat, it sounds like she's learnt English!
## Frequently asked questions
What features does EzDubs offer for real-time translation?
    
EzDubs offers real-time translation for phone calls, voice messages, text messages, and video messages. It also supports integration with video conferencing apps for meetings and team messaging.
How does EzDubs handle phone call translations?
    
EzDubs provides live phone call translation, allowing users to call any phone number and communicate in different languages. The app translates the conversation in real-time, replicating voice and emotions, ensuring that not only the words but also the tone and sentiment of the conversation are accurately conveyed across languages.
Does EzDubs support conversations with multiple languages?
    
Yes, EzDubs allows users to form groups where each participant can communicate in their preferred language. The app translates text and voice messages in real-time, making it easy for everyone in the group to understand each other, regardless of the language spoken. This feature is ideal for multilingual teams or international group chats.
Is EzDubs compatible with popular video conferencing apps?
    
Yes, EzDubs can be integrated with popular video conferencing apps like Zoom and Google Meet. This allows for seamless translation during meetings and team messaging sessions.
How can I download the EzDubs app?
    
You can download EzDubs from both the Google Play Store for Android devices and the App Store for iOS devices. Links to both are provided on the website, or you can scan the QR code displayed on the page to download the app directly.

Yes, EzDubs can be integrated with popular video conferencing apps like Zoom and Google Meet. This allows for seamless translation during meetings and team messaging sessions.
How can I download the EzDubs app?
    
You can download EzDubs from both the Google Play Store for Android devices and the App Store for iOS devices. Links to both are provided on the website, or you can scan the QR code displayed on the page to download the app directly.

generated_description:
**EzDubs: Breaking Language Barriers in Real-Time**

Founded in 2022 and part of the Y Combinator Batch W23, EzDubs is a San Francisco-based startup revolutionizing communication through real-time speech translation. Their mission is simple yet ambitious: make seamless multilingual communication accessible to everyone.

**What Makes EzDubs Unique?**
EzDubs’ proprietary technology translates speech without waiting for full sentences, mimics voices in real time without requiring prior voice training, and even captures emotional nuances in translation. This capability sets it apart in a crowded field of translation apps.

**User-Friendly Applications**  
EzDubs is available on both iOS and Android and can translate live phone calls, automatically dub voice messages, and facilitate text conversations. Think of it as a versatile communication tool perfect for connecting with friends, managing remote teams, or maintaining relationships where language differences exist. It's like chatting with a neighbor, regardless of the spoken language.

**Core Features:**
- **Real-time Translation:** Instant translation during conversations.
- **Voice and Emotion Cloning:** Users can maintain their unique tone and emotional expressions in translations.
- **Multiple Communication Channels:** Supports phone calls, voice and text messaging, and even video message dubbing.

**Integration Made Easy**  
EzDubs isn’t just limited to its app. It’s designed to integrate with popular communication tools such as WhatsApp, Skype, Google Meet, and Discord, making it a versatile addition to any communication stack.

**Languages Supported**
EzDubs currently translates between English, Spanish, French, Arabic, Dutch, and Catalan. 

**Why Choose EzDubs?**
Thousands of users have already embraced EzDubs to enhance their communication experiences. Testimonials reveal how the app has improved their interactions, whether in personal or professional settings, eliminating the hassle of switching between apps or relying on personal translators.

**How to Get Started**  
Curious to try this innovative technology? Visit [EzDubs.ai](http://www.ezdubs.ai) to download the app and experience a live demo. For businesses looking to enhance multilingual communications, EzDubs can integrate effortlessly into your existing frameworks.

With a lean team of six and backed by notable investors like Jared Friedman, EzDubs is on a mission to change how we connect across cultures. In a world where communication is increasingly vital, EzDubs makes breaking language barriers not just possible but remarkably easy. 

Want to be part of this revolution? Check out the app today, and take your conversations global!
